Directions: In a large skillet, saute onion, green pepper and garlic in butter until crisp-tender. Add the corn, tomatoes, sugar, salt, pepper and cayenne. Cook for 10 minutes or until heated through. Stir in the milk and green onions; simmer for 10 minutes. Add shrimp; cook for 8 minutes or until shrimp turn pink.
Ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes and green chilies, undrained
2 pounds uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
